<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>6</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>10</mn>
      <mn>4</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mn>7</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>10</mn>
      <mn>3</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mn>0</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>10</mn>
      <mn>2</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mn>0</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>10</mn>
      <mn>1</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mn>0</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>10</mn>
      <mn>0</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">6 \times {10^4} + 7 \times {10^3} + 0 \times {10^2} + 0 \times {10^1} + 0 \times {10^0}</annotation></semantics></math>

questionSetStimulus: For the following exercises, express the expanded number as a Hindu-Arabic number.
